about_the_game:
An Evocative Hand-Crafted World

The world of Diamond Sun is brought to life in vivid, moody detail, its caverns alive with bizarre and terrifying creatures, each animated by hand in a unique 3D style. Every new area you’ll discover is beautifully unique and strange, teeming with new creatures and characters. Take in the sights and uncover new wonders hidden off of the beaten path. If you like classic gameplay, cute but creepy characters, epic adventure and beautiful, gothic worlds, then Legacy Buster awaits!

Brave the Depths of a Forgotten Kingdom

Beneath the surface of a forgotten world lies an ancient, ruined kingdom shrouded in mystery. Many venture into its depths, chasing after treasure, glory, or long-buried secrets. Diamond Sun is a classically inspired rogue-like adventure set in a sprawling, interconnected world. Traverse winding tunnels, explore lost cities, and navigate perilous landscapes; face off against fearsome foes, encounter eccentric allies, and unravel the enigmatic truths hidden at the heart of this forgotten realm.
